name: zvips
description: A blazingly fast image processing library in Zig using libvips
readme:
# Zvips
Libvips bindings for Zig using GObject Introspection

# System Dependencies

## Arch Linux

### Runtime dependencies

```elvish
sudo pacman -S libvips libheif glib2
```

### Build time dependencies

```elvish
sudo pacman -S libxslt
```
owner_bio: Love Systems Programming, The creation of robust, maintainable, and performant software.
